paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various TTR variants, particularly focusing on their role in amyloidogenesis and associated penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: S52P TTR is highly amyloidogenic and forms abundant amyloid fibrils in vitro.

variants.segregation_data: The observations are consistent with earlier onset and more aggressive phenotypes in carriers of amyloidogenic TTR mutations.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: S52P TTR was shown to be cleaved by plasmin and forms amyloid fibrils.
key_quotes: The most aggressive, earlier onset forms of the disease are caused by highly destabilizing mutations.
All the amyloidogenic TTR variants tested so far, as well as WT TTR, were cleaved by plasmin.

functional_data.summary: V30M TTR is amyloidogenic but forms lower yields of fibrils compared to S52P.

variants.segregation_data: The yield of fibrils was lower with V30M compared to S52P.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: V30M TTR was cleaved by plasmin but yielded lower fibril formation.
key_quotes: The yields were lower with V30M, L55P, and V122I TTR than with S52P.

functional_data.summary: L55P TTR is amyloidogenic but forms lower yields of fibrils compared to S52P.

variants.segregation_data: The yield of fibrils was lower with L55P compared to S52P.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: L55P TTR was cleaved by plasmin but yielded lower fibril formation.
key_quotes: The yields were lower with V30M, L55P, and V122I TTR than with S52P.

functional_data.summary: V122I TTR is amyloidogenic but forms lower yields of fibrils compared to S52P.

variants.segregation_data: The yield of fibrils was lower with V122I compared to S52P.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: V122I TTR was cleaved by plasmin but yielded lower fibril formation.
key_quotes: The yields were lower with V30M, L55P, and V122I TTR than with S52P.

functional_data.summary: T119M TTR is superstable and not cleaved by plasmin.

variants.segregation_data: Co-inheritance of T119M variant protects against TTR amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: T119M TTR was not cleaved at all by plasmin.
key_quotes: The known, superstable, T119M TTR variant was not cleaved at all.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant TTR variants were extracted with associated functional and penetrance data.
